carpet.rule.pistonBlockChunkLoader.name: PistonBlockChunkLoader
carpet.rule.pistonBlockChunkLoader.desc: Load nearby chunks for 3 seconds when a piston is triggered (Centered on the piston head)
carpet.rule.pistonBlockChunkLoader.extra: When Diamond_ore is on the piston,Load 1x1 lazy chunk
When Emerald_ore is on the piston,Load 3x3 chunk
When Gold_ore is on the piston,Load 1x1 chunk
When a piston/sticky piston is in the netherworld with bedrock below and a redstone torch above the next block,Load 1x1 lazy chunk
carpet.rule.endGatewayChunkLoader.name: EndGatewayChunkLoader
carpet.rule.endGatewayChunkLoader.desc: When the entity passes through the ender gateway, the target chunk will be loaded for 3 seconds like nether portal
carpet.rule.PortalPearlWarp.name: PortalPearlWarp
carpet.rule.PortalPearlWarp.desc: It allows the player to be teleported 8x the distance of their current coords
carpet.rule.scheduledRandomTickPlants.de: Make all plants accepts scheduled tick as random tick
carpet.rule.mergeTNTPro.name: MergeTNTPro
carpet.rule.mergeTNTPro.desc: Combined with large amounts of TNT to reduce lag caused by entities and explosions
carpet.rule.pearlTickets.name: PearlTickets
carpet.rule.pearlTickets.desc: Allows Ender Pearl entity to selectively load chunks
carpet.rule.chestMinecartChunkLoader.des: ChestMinecart can load nearby chunks for 2 seconds,when ChestMinecart customName is Load
carpet.rule.projectileRaycastLength.name: projectileRaycastLengthValidato
carpet.rule.projectileRaycastLength.desc: Changes the distance projectiles check for collisions. If set to 0 all Blocks to the destination will be checked which is the Vanilla behaviour.
carpet.rule.projectileRaycastLength.extr: This reduces lag for fast projectiles. In 1.12 the value was 200.
carpet.rule.pearlPosVelocity.name: pearlPosVelocity
carpet.rule.pearlPosVelocity.desc: Can check the real position and speed of the ender pearl when the ender PearlTickets is enabled.
Re-adds teleporting to portal POIs without portal blocks 's rule
carpet.rule.keepWorldTickUpdate.name: KeepWorldTickUpdate
carpet.rule.keepWorldTickUpdate.desc: After 300 ticks without any players in the current dimension on the server, Minecraft will stop entities updates, This rule will bypass this restriction
carpet.rule.disableBatCanSpawn.name: DisableBatCanSpawn
carpet.rule.cactusWrenchSound.name: CactusWrenchSound
carpet.rule.cactusWrenchSound.desc: Play 'BLOCK_DISPENSER_LAUNCH' sound when using cactus to flip block
carpet.rule.disablePortalUpdate.name: DisablePortalUpdate
carpet.rule.disablePortalUpdate.desc: Nether portal blocks will not react after receiving block updates
carpet.rule.stringDupeReintroduced.name: StringDupeReintroduced
carpet.rule.stringDupeReintroduced.desc: Reintroduced the string dupe feature, you can use this rule to continue using the string farm
carpet.rule.sharedVillagerDiscounts.name: SharedVillagerDiscounts
carpet.rule.sharedVillagerDiscounts.desc: Share villagers discount to all players
carpet.rule.itemShadowing.name: ItemShadowing
carpet.rule.itemShadowing.desc: Reintroducing the logic of swapping between inventory in 1.16.5
carpet.rule.magicBox.name: MagicBox
carpet.rule.SignCommand.name: SignCommand
carpet.rule.SignCommand.desc: The player right-clicks the sign to execute the command on the sign
